#How to add new property
= Introduction =

if you want to add new property, you should write your property's name   in {{{properties.properties}}} file in the following format:

{{{ 
<property's name> = ${<property's name>}
 }}}

for example:
*host = ${host}*

then you should write your property in {{{development.properties}}} in the next format:
{{{
<property's name> = ${<property's value>}  
*Attencion!!! ${<property's VALUE>}
}}}
